attributes.action: Automatic multiple visa for parents of british citizens
attributes.additional_details: My mother has not been able to visit me for the 15 years due to visa refusal. Being employee in NHS i do not have very limited days to visit her.
attributes.background: Most british citizens are deprived of seing their parents for years . Due to limited holidays for British employee, son or daughter can not spend enough time with their parents. This right should be given as part of human right.
